title: pistil Women's Viva Trucker Hat
features: Mid-profile trucker cap with soft, suede-like fabric on brim and front panel
Pistil original artwork patch embroidered on crown
Adjustable back closure lets you personalize your fit
Hand wash in cold water; Lay flat to dry; Do not tumble dry
Lined front panel and matching seam tape
description: Salute the mountains and the sun. The Viva is a classic Trucker hat with an original embroidered patch that nods toward the mountains. This women's hat has soft suede-like fabric on the brim and front panel, and an adjustable back closure lets you customize the fit.
